user_query: I am planning a family trip to watch a soccer match. Can you provide me with the latest matches and their odds? I would like to compare the odds for different matches and choose the best one for my family.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest soccer match schedules.
Retrieve the odds for the fetched soccer matches.
Compare the odds of different matches to determine the best option.
Book tickets for the selected soccer match based on the comparison.
